forum.content:
No one can ever teach you what is the right thing to do and not to mention how to do it. Without a doubt, life becomes a struggle especially when you've lost something that means a lot to you, something that matters more than your life itself. Being left all alone to face all this ain't easy at all. I've tried my best but obviously failed to forget how wonderful you are. You're amazing, just the way you are.
I know I am the one to blame, and very possibly you've forgotten all about me, but not me about you..
Even though it's all my fault, you don't need to be so cruel on me, do you?
forum.title: Love is a struggle.
